Directions: In a bowl, combine the flour, 1 cup sugar, baking powder and salt.  In another bowl, beat the egg, milk and oil. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened.  Fold in rhubarb.

Fill paper-lined muffin cups three-fourths full. Sprinkle with remaining sugar. Bake at 350 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack.
Ingredients: 1 cup chopped fresh or frozen rhubarb
